title: ranked system op op
body: Riot seriously needs to fix there ranked system people I think they need to try and update there system to something better that actually rewards and ranks players based on how good they are not how good other people are. Its hard to fix i understand but still there are millions of players playing and paying for this game it would be nice to see riot do something{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Well after the game we just had together I'd think its more about you not your team. We needed a tank and you decided to build ad/ap on Hecarim and then spend all game farming and trying to gank under turret{{item:3070}}  although having that kat flame the entire game probably didn't help. Try clearing wards before going in for a gank and learning the different paths to take while ganking because that may help you in future.

There: a location, or reference to an object or group (ie there it is)
Their: belonging to them
They're: they are

Less time gaming, more time in school.
I only post this because you use the word frequently, with a low success rate.
